title: A Delicate Balance(ing Act)
content: On 29 January 2024, a beloved red monster asked a question that broke the internet: “How is everybody doing?” (Elmo 2024). Elmo soon learned that many people were decidedly not okay. While the wave of responses from folks facing serious challenges was heartbreaking, it was also amazing to see other humans (and some Muppets) reach out to strangers with words of comfort.
